content.rendered:
Aegean Airlines S.A. was founded as Aegean Aviation in 1987. It is the largest Greek airline by total number of passengers carried, by number of destinations served and by fleet size. A Star Alliance member since June 2010, it operates scheduled and charter services from Athens and Thessaloniki to other major Greek destinations as well as to a number of European and Middle Eastern destinations. Its main hubs are Athens International Airport in Athens, Thessaloniki International Airport in Thessaloniki and Larnaca International Airport in Cyprus. It also uses other Greek airports as bases, some of which are seasonal. It has its head office in Kifisia, a suburb of Athens. Although the airline is the largest airline in Greece, it is not a flag carrier.
Phone:
(+49) 06-92385630

International customer care number: (+30) 210 6261000

Aegean Airlines Official website: https://en.aegeanair.com/

Aegean Airlines Online Check-in: www.Aegean Airlines.com/in/gb/online check-in

Note: Online check-in is available 48 hours to 30 minutes prior to scheduled time of departure.

Check Aegean Airlines schedule here: www.Aegean Airlines.com/in/gb/flight schedule

Check Aegean Airlines flight status here: www.Aegean Airlines.com/in/gb/flight status

Aegean Airlines Baggage
